content.detailedDescription:
1. i was home, in backyard loking with my whife thru telescope meade etx-70.

2. i was looking for m51 whirlpool galaxy when noticed triangle shaped siluete hovering. then sudenly fast changed direction to right (east).Then stoped. called my whife to see that. we was able to track that one object for about 15 minutes, then another triangle shaped ufo came right next to first one and both of them turned lights, all around object. then we saw clearly that both of them is 2 triangle shaped ufos.  then for about 50 minutes we able to track them on sky, for moments we lost them from site because they were so fast, and they have unpredictable directions, they was flying straigth then sharp turnes,then sudden stop, but we able to find them again. we didnt saw them with naked eyes, just with telescope so i dont know that they were in our atmosphere or in space.

3. first time to me it looks like a airplane b2 or f117. but planes cant hower and change directions like that.

4. howering, fast moves, unpredictable directions, fast start and sudden stop, and howering again.

5. i was excited, so as my whife. that is her first time to see something, for me that was the last, but saw few times strange lights and objects earlier.

6. about after 1 hour 5-10 minutes they just turned off lights and disapeared from our sight. from that day im always using astro cam and laptop in case i see something strange again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 triangle shaped ufos with lights around them

content.detailedDescription:
I was hiking with my kids (ages 8 and 10) on the wide open plateau above our house. it was around 7:30 pm still light - sun about 20deg above the horizon. we saw the goodyear blimp in the distance - in town for the stanley cup playoffs. 

as we turned around and walked back in the other direction we saw what first looked to be a maybe a black kite or paratrooper in the distance. it was slowly descending floating down- we still too far away to identify and thought that maybe it was a hot air balloon. as we got closer we could tell it was def. not a balloon. it was trapezoid shaped with two round appendages hanging down (like wheels). it was completely black with sharp corners on the visible sides. it slowly descended into the valley below the treeline- possibly moving more horizontally as it descended. it definitely was coming down at an angle of 45 deg. or less as it went out of sight. my daughter thought it looked like a floating trashcan.
content.summary: Watched trapezoid shaped solid black object with two hanging round balls descend into the valley below the treeline- looked like a floating trashcan

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of a plane taking off and found ufo in photo.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of a plane taking off and found ufo in photo.

content.detailedDescription: At the time of the sighting me and my son noticed what we thought was a star. object glowed very bright blue white then faded in and out to a yellow orange. in between fading noticed rapid movement and shape change from a very far distance in space. the object continued these characteristics for a half hour or more. i also have a 6 minute video of said object. the video is on my facebook page
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright white blue fading into yellow orange repeatedly

content.detailedDescription:
Flying home on southwest flight 4280 from denver to md on 5/30/2016. taking photos out of window, 6:22 pm, noticed ufo when reviewing photos from vacation. took 2 consecutive photos within seconds only on one photo. at first glance i thought it was part of the clouds but when i zoom in it is not a cloud at all. did not see it when i took the photo. i know there was no other planes near me and there was nothing on the window. it seems to have light wavering around it, there is a clear outline on the disch shape and patterns on top of it.

atached is the exact longitude/latitude gps coordinate based on the photo and my flight plan. one photo i snapped at 6:22 from the time stamp on my phone, seconds later i snapped the photo with the disc in it. one other photo is blown up with the contrast and lightness adjusted to show more detail and zoomed in.
content.summary: Caught photo of ufo out plane window

content.detailedDescription:
Whilst on holiday (predominantly in south africa) we had a 2 day short stopover in singapore in june of 2006 before heading back home to australia.

on top of the merlion at sentosa island, singapore i tried to capture the tiger sky tower revolving restaurant before it disappeared from view behind trees....I took two quick shots (burst) on a new nikon d50 in raw format.

upon viewing the pictures on the d50's tiny screen to see if i had caught the restaurant i noticed a dot which i thought may be a speck on the lens but there was nothing visible on the lens to note of when i checked it.

about a week later when viewing all the photos from our trip i froze when i saw the two pictures of the restaurant. 

in each image there is a cylindrical object of a matte dull grey colour which looks to be a emitting a beam upward.
the photos taken a 10th of a second apart shows that the object had traveled a (unknown) distance from one frame to the next.
the object (to me) resembles the same shape as a lego man's head. there is a shadow beneath it (cast from the light of the sun above) showing that is three dimensional.

i have absolutely no idea what this could be.
i did not actually witness anything in the sky (probably because looking through the d50's view finder) and i didn't notice anything odd through the view finder either.

being new to the camera (and photography in general) i was shooting everything in raw format (for the whole trip) which luckily records a lot of data about each photo to do with the camera.

i'm hoping by submitting these photos i may get some answer perhaps(?).

the photos i am submitting are 'lower quality' jpegs taken from the original nikon nef/raw format...Which i am happy to forward for analysis.
content.summary: Two photos 10th of a second apart show 'something' cylindrical that is casting a beam upward.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I always go outside every night and look at the sky. for the last few months i've seen countless ufos that appear from nowhere and quickly speed off into space. the first few times i seen them i would have panic attacks but now its like they want me to see them.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright lights that appear from nowhere, moving in different directions

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at a star in the sky and the a bright ball of light came out of it then faded away, there were no planes or vehicles in the sky, it just got bright then faded away, it looked like ufo lights u see in some ufo videos
content.summary: Ball of light

content.detailedDescription: My grandmother and i seen 3 lights dancing around each other. they were small and bright. i was in total amazement by them. that night i had a dream about falling through the air. the next morning i got real sick. these dreams and sickness still are happing today and becoming more and more frequent. the dreams are showing people in this room that i am in. they are standing around me but i cannot see much detail as they are like in shadows.
content.summary: Seen lights off back porch. were dancing around each other

content.detailedDescription: Nightly i go out to observe stars and planets.  the other night, around 1am i was looking directly up and looking at the stars.  one started to move.  it moved at a leisurely pace toward the east and then was obscured by cloud cover.  i thought it might be a satellite or the space station.  i have observed satellites before and this was too bright to be a satellite.  maybe a meteor or something.  but it had no brilliant glow or intensity in it's appearance.  i do not believe it is an airplane.  we are in the flight path of msp so i am used to seeing departing (higher altitude) planes and landing (lower altitude) planes.  i did not see navigation lights or strobes.  it was like a star that was stationary and started moving, literally.
content.summary: Directly above observer starlike object was stationary, then moved in easterly direction

content.detailedDescription:
I decided to try to take photos during a bad electrical storm. the storm was particularly intense.
the following morning when i downloaded my photos to the computer i couldn't believe my eyes.
the first photo was a top to bottom lightening strike - which i was very proud of !!
the second photo was a lightening strike from left to right (se to s), but at the end of the lightening bolt there is a bright "something" on it's own.
the third photo i have always told myself must be some kind of appearance of raindrops, but with eyes.
it is no kind of trick photography and my friends also never had any explanation, it is just i saw a programme on tv about your organisation and wondered if you could explain these photos to me once and for all.
i really hope i haven't wasted your time.
best regards
caroline
content.summary: While taking photos of electrical storm

content.detailedDescription: Had early morning paper route.The hartford courant papers had to be delivered by 6 am. it was a cold november morning, i could see my breath. walked from house to the shed to get my bike (about 15 feet.) noticed the moon must be full because it was really bright and thought i would look after i got my bike. once it was out i decided to look at the moon. looking toward the light source i freaked out. it wasn't the moon at all! there above my neighbours 2 story house not more than 30 feet away was a very large round craft of unknown origin. i quickly ran to the side of the shed to hide. after less than a minute i thought if something could build that thing it could have zapped me by now. so i decided to look at it full on. looking up i was amazed and frightened at the same time. it sat there motionless. trying to get an idea of its size i looked around for something to compare it to and a telephone pole caught my eye and it was a good fit for the diameter of the craft. watching for a few seconds more a semicurcular band of light appeared on the bottom red in color then another band appeared orange in color displacing the red (red remained above), then another color appeared in turn i think blue, the craft took on the colors of the band's as they appeared,there was no sound as it ascended moving slow at first but picked up as the band's went faster, in all once it started to move and as the band's went faster the craft went faster going straight up into the heavens and disappearing from sight.(about 5 seconds at speed) i was 13 years old then and am 65 now. this is the first time i have publicly told this true story, to avoid ridicule on a story that was not accepted by people in the early sixties.
content.summary: Had paper route, 5:30 am went to shed for bike bright outside unusual was it. full moon? looked up no moon just bright orb above neighbors house

content.detailedDescription: Was going for walk at 4am.  looking south a hugh white light caught my eye a's it was falling.  was in sight about four seconds. went behind houses and trees and showed big fladh when it disappeared
content.summary: Large light falling from shy. disappeared then show white flash

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were barbecueing nice clear night. my boyfriend observed object pass over (tree top), multiple colors, triangle shape, lights all around outside, very little to no noise, second object same, but only three lights on each corner, a little to no noise.Both objects head west. right over are heads. thought either ufo or new type of government craft. did not have camera, happen so fast.
content.summary: Sitting in back yard with boyfriend. he saw the first triangle shaped object multiple lights, all around the outside of craft. second object triangle shape  had three lights. on each edge  a light in center. traveling  from the ocean area towards the west

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
First i was at good will in the parking lot waiting for my wife in my truck, i was sitting in the drivers seat facing the building parked in the middle of the parking lot facing the building,  with my 3 year old daughter autumn in the back seat, right behind me. and i was taking photos of the sky hopefully waiting to see the sun peak through the thick cloud cover, because three days prior i had captured what appeared to be a "tiny - second sun" in the sky that emitted much light but was not nearly the size of the sun, and the light it emitted is blue/white. the photos i uploaded are what's called "live photos" taken on my iphone 6s. it is a new model phone with a great camera and i am very familiar with lens flare effects and this is definitely not that. the light is always moving at a very quick speed very smoothly with my camera still as i am taking live photos and sometimes time lapses and i make sure to have my exposure lock turned on so that when i see it the light won't blur out my cameras contrast etc. this is the same way i take time lapses of the sun sets and time lapses of the clouds moving. as i said 3 days earlier i caught a similar tiny blue white circular light, actually in front of another good will store in rogers because i was again waiting for my wife who was in the store for maybe 15 minutes as she usually is when she goes there to look for books to read. so when i was at the maple grove goodwill (the one near elm creek blvd) i took a bunch of live photos which are like mini animations and i can show you those in person i believe you may need an iphone to view these files but am not sure. i also have other videos and photos of the sun and clouds and the sky taken in the same half hour period as the files, i would like to also submit everything taken that day. but  just choosing the best ones, i hope the live photos show up as mini videos like they are supposed to because that's the way to see the real speed this orb / planet/sun/ ufo/round object, and the speed at which it moved. when my wife got back to the car i showed her some of the live photos i had just taken, and she thought they were not normal but said maybe my camera was getting lens flares, but i know for a fact that there is no way these are caused by lens flares based on the still camera and the way they move so fast and fluidly the row the sky, behind the clouds but visible shining through thinner layers and totally visible through no layers whenever possible. i am also including a video of the video taken from another iphone 6 s. after she got in the car we went to platos closet i the the grove square area of maple grove which is only two blocks away, and i saw the clouds were clearing up just a bit that i might catch more of this light in the sky. so i started taking a time lapse video, or do i thought because it turned out to be recording the light/ object in slo- mo instead which turned out to a huge blessing. i was taking videos and pics when i was parking the car waiting to get out and bring my used jeans not to sell. but when i got out of the car to walk in i noticed a few small clearing in the sky so decided and i thought i saw the tiny sun light object and decided  to take one last clip which turned out to be slo mo (high speed footage) and even though i couldn't see my phone screen because the sky was too bright, the fact that i could not look at it without sneezing made my realize i was getting the light on film and just was hoping to catch the circle moving across the sky, which it totally did. and fast too, i kept my phone perfectly still until the end because i thought it was a time lapse. and the object was mostly behind the clouds and appeared to illuminate the sky and clouds around if, almost like a sun. but much smsller and dimmer, but still very very bright so you can't just look at it. it was nearly straight up in the skywbpve where i was standing looking straight up or almost straight up but the object moved from the middle of my camera to the bottom of my camer in a matter of seconds and even in slow motion it moves fairly fast.  i am unsure if the original video or even the time lapses or live photos may be seen on your phone unless it's an iphone so oil included a video of my watching the video because i don't know howvelsevto share a slo mo video, they don't just uploaded ike the time lapse videos do, once i got back to the car from the used clothing store, i looked closely at my new slo lo video and realized i had captured the glowing circle perfectly clearly and i realized at that time how fast it was tracking through the sky just above the clouds it appeared or maybe in orbit? but moving extremely fast? and i was feeling very excited, even when i was in the store for 5 minutes i peeked at the clip and knew it was going to be really good once analyzed and zoomed in etc. the other day when i caught the similar object at the rogers good will i was so mesmerized by it and couldn't stop thinking about even the whole 2 days and the when my wife wanted to go to good will in maple grove o thought maybe i'll get to see this poking through the sky again and i will catch it better this time, but i only caught it for glimpses hidden within the live photos mini videos. until we went to platos closet two blocks away,i realized ghost i could probably get it good because i saw a hole in the clouds and i thought to myself and said outl loud that the hole would probably be lined up just right when i got two blocks over to the other store and it was pretty much do i started taking the time lapse but accidentally put it on slo motion and i'm so glad i did that because it really caught it clearly moving behind and through the clouds, the only time i saw blue sky during that half hour was 2 times i saw holes in the clouds but all i could see through the small
 holes, both times was airplanes leading con trails. and it almost seemed like they were trying to fill in the small. holes i the sky with their newly spread out contrails, these were the only two tiny patches of blue sky on an otherwise bed obercast densely cloudy day.
content.summary: Saw blue-white light emitting circle move fast just above lower clouds across sky west to east

content.detailedDescription:
Went out front, noticed very big red light in sky, holding position.  thought it might be a rocket launch, but it was holding position, hover.  it then dropped perhaps 500 feet, then stopped.  grabbed binoculars.  craft began a fast descent, about 4000 feet per minute.  went out of site behind trees.  about 3 to 5 miles from my position at 75th ave and the 101 loop in north phoenix.

in the binoculars, this had two large red lights, size of pie pans, and tiny nav light on right, green, but it was blinking fast, like a very fast strobe.  the width between the bright red lights was the width of a car, about 3 to 4 feet, very large for lights, very bright, like brake lights 'on'.

about 2 minutes later, a helicopter is coming at my exact direction which is inline with deer valley airport and we have a hospital between me and the approaching helo.  i thought i could hear rotor blades.  it suddenly stops, and i dont know how it could stop.  it dropped, held position, then it went down like a rock, about 5,000 fpm.  what i thought in my mind was, its rotors might have to brake off to go down that fast, or it was nosing down at 45 degrees, but my vision told me it was holding still, no movement.  before, i could see it was coming at me at fast speed, then stopped.  also, it appeared to have 2 white lights that came on before it fast dropped.  lights were dim, maybe pointing downwards and i was seeing their edge.

these were over sun city just north of union hills by one mile.

i have never seen two red bright lights on the back of a helo or a plane.  these were also quite bright.

i am a former student pilot, lots of flying time, and i traffic spot the planes, so this was very odd to see.  i also watch the planets and have basic astronomy.  so i can tell you, what i saw was radical.

the two both exhibited a 'very fast' descent.  they both could hover and both could go straight down.  this 'should' be difficult for a helo if the rotor disc is flat, as it causes drag coming straight down.  the helo would have to have blades that aimed downwards in pitch to actually force itself down at that speed, if that is possible.  

what i thought at first was that i was seeing the back of a air ambulance helo, going into a crash status, engines out, auto-rotation.  then another helo coming at me, two lights come on, it stops, then also drops at high speed.  very odd.
content.summary: Bright red light, stationary in sky, dropped and stopped, then continuous drop until out of site.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from my best friend's home when i hit north street , i see what i think at first two airplanes .As i see more closely it is a airplane with the blinking light and he is following a ufo .The ufo did not have a blinking light like the airplane and as i watched the ufo started to hover like it was waiting for the plane to catch up .I lost sight of them as they flew to the east of me .I put my window down to see if i could hear a sound ,i could not hear any.
content.summary: Driving home i saw a airplane following a ufo!!!!

content.detailedDescription: This happened between 12:20 am and 12:28 am on june 1st 2016. i got bored and went outside to set up my night vision camera for a skywatch as i was setting it up i noticed a plane in the sky (which was ups i checked with plane finder website) above the plane, i saw a bright white object travel from west to east i would estimate 45,000-50,000 ft since the ups plane was 38,000 ft. when it got in front of my line of sight it got so bright i could hardly look at it and it traveled extremely fast in a north east direction it did not slow down it was a very abrupt turn as it got out of sight it left a tail behind it like a comet would.
content.summary: Very bright light from went to east then suddenly went north east

content.detailedDescription:
Eagle river, wisc. date of sighting: 05/26/2016 (10:15pm)  conditions: clear, cloudless night time skies, with no wind whatsoever. (~20 sec. observation).

it was late evening and suddenly i had an 'strong' feeling to go outside on my deck and take my new 'night vision' scope outside...  as soon as i opened up the sliding doors to the deck area and walked out, i immediately noticed a very large blue/white 'orb' moving in a northeast direction (above the tree-line about 1/4 mile away).  the blue/white 'orb' was at least 3 times larger and many times brighter than when i've observed jupiter or venus (closest approximation to relative size is holding an aspirin up at arms length). i immediately turned on my night vision scope and had to re-focus the scope from 'infinity' to more of a near-field object to get the 'orb' in relative sharp focus.  the surrounding edges of the orb were not distinct and were somewhat defused in the night scope. in comparison, if i focus the night vision scope on the stars, the stars are true, sharp 'pin-points' of light (of varying brightness).

the color of the orb (sight viewing) was a distinct blue/white and did not vary in intensity during the ~20 sec. sighting.  there was no sound emanating from the object as i could tell.  the 'orb' continued its trajectory from the southwest to northeast until i lost sight of the orb due to trees in the field of view.

this is the third time i've observed 'objects' at my lake home since my 2003 sighting of a cigar-shaped (pill-shaped) object in broad daylight, 2014 sighting of an orange orb in close proximity (wife also viewed this orange orb with me) and now this 2016 sighting of this particular blue/white orb.
content.summary: Large blue-white orb - eagle river, wisc.

content.detailedDescription: nous ã©tions a 3 assis sur des pierres au bord de la rn 75 reliant bejaia a setif(dept algã©riens)et pas loin   du village ou nous habitons .On discutait de tout et de rien quand un des notre a remarque que la planã¨te mars s'est dã©placã©e ,car habitues a se rã©fugier sur cette crãªte pour retrouver un peu de fraã®cheur notamment en ces moments de chaleur.Avant 20 jours mars apparaã®t juste a proximitã© d'une montagne surplombant la rã©gion (tikintouchte 1300m d'altitude) en ce moment la aux environs de 21h. nos regards tous les trois sont braques vers le ciel pour designer jupiter ou saturne car on sait que venus est visible uniquement au coucher du soleil. tellement nos regards sont restes braques au ciel ,j'ai remarque un point de lumiã¨re blanche qui se dã©place au ciel (phã©nomã¨ne frã©quent;des points de lumiã¨res blanches qui se dã©placent dans le ciel avec une vitesse constante et sans clignotement).J'ai attire l'attention des autres sur ce phã©nomã¨ne pour essayer de le comprendre et on ã©voquait des avions qui volent a haute altitude ou bien des des vols intercontinentales.Soudain un avion je pense d'air algã©rie vient de traverser et se dirige vers l'est  et on a bien remarque ses feux qui clignotait et son bruit .Tout a coups une lumiã¨re dominante dans le ciel surgit au dessus de nos tãªtes(je prã©cise que notre champ visuel tous les trois ã©tait nne).Tellement cette lumiã¨re ã©tait claire et visible elle a attire notre attention tous les trois,câ€™ã©tait juste au dessus de nos tã¨tes si cette lumiã¨re est apparue subitement ou bien elle est venus de derriã¨re on ne sait pas .Ce qui est certain c'est que cette lumiã¨re ne s'est pas arrãªtes elle a pris sa course nne et nous on sâ€™attendait au moment de croisement avec l'avion qu'on observait tout a l'heure et qui a pris le direction de l'est.Et au moment du croisement il s'es tavere que la lumiã¨re ã©tait beaucoup plus haute que l'avion et on a observe la lumiã¨re jusquâ€™ã  sa disparition dans l'horizon.Sa trajectoire est directe et sa vitesse est stable mais surement pas celle d'un avion. description de la lumiã¨re;premiã¨re observation au dessus de nos tã¨tes.;forme circulaire entourã©e avec la couleurs orange et au centre couleur chrome ou bleu c'est difficile de distinguer le genre de couleur mais c'est comme un miroir .Dâ€™aprã¨s son altitude, comparã©e a celle de l'avion ,cette lumiã¨re est de grande taille et pas de bruit .J'ai voulu faire ce tã©moignage car  j'ai vu un phã©nomã¨ne incroyable  jamais vu une chose pareille ce n'est ni un avion ni un hã©licoptã¨re ni un missile .Cela s'est passe tres vite qu'on a pas pu observer autre chose comme le carcasse d'une ovni ou????
content.summary: Lumiere cerculaire oange de l'extrieure .

content.detailedDescription: Star gazing facing north, had been for hours, still narrowing down exact time but before moonrise. first saw object east about 10 degrees above horizon, brightest object in sky (thought iss at first) at about 80degrees above realized moving way too fast. while directly over head, in front of us blinking "stars"(oranges, yellows, reds but mostly white) started moving erratic while object over head kept its course. there were other blinking objects toward the west too. about this time main fast moving object (bright blue white, triangle shape)appeared to weave and fluctuate slightly off course and appeared to pick up stars. best description i can say is it looked like it vacuumed up stars/objects(?) and leave a dark path. the left/right path fluctuations kind of like a fishing lure jigging side to side but almost straight toward north west till disappeared on horizon. easily 20+ objects were gone, took less than 3 minutes to cross entire sky. still many erratic blinking lights observed for a few minutes after. myself and another witness experienced real screaming fear ( approx. at zenith, realizing can't be space station, to fast, bright and not moving exactly straight) yelling trying to wake 3rd party. once calmer, i looked at other witness and face appeared puffy around left eye/cheek, i commented that it looked like he was hit by a bus. the last quarter moon started to rise shortly later. noticed strange things like my beverage given by 3rd party before he slept was still cold, while other witness was warm and sunrise seemed too fast. after spending all night up i felt oddly fresh. other witness thinks missing time.
content.summary: Bright blinking lights while star watching approx 3-4 am (1 brighter,faster than iss) almost straight line with slight wobble, picking up lights, dark trail after.  many areas of blinking/moving lights after passover but many gone

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from fort wayne, indiana on u.S. 24. i was heading east and the object i witnessed was to the northeast. it was a silver object that appeared long, vertically. it appeared to fade in and out as though it were passing through clouds, which there were clouds in the sky. the silver was very bright due to sunlight hitting it. it was visible for a very short period of time. it appeared to be moving northward along a straight path.
content.summary: Silver wavering object seen just west of antwerp on u.S. 24.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the road with my girlfriend on interstate 75 in cincinnati ohio by hamilton exit when i first notice the reddish-orange lights which i thought was a building at first but as we got closer i realize it was much too high the lights were in the shape of two spheres what the craft giving off a glare that look like a triangle shape premier league got off on the exit nearest to craft so so we can get closer but as we turned around the craft begin to turn and light's become one then the object ascended for a short distance then seemed to disappear without a trace i tried explaining the incident but there seemed to be no explanation i served in the military 12 years and no military craft and civilian seen a similar object once out at sea which mood very rapidly at different angles
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright reddish orange lights with a glare the sort of look like a triangle shape ashcraft turn lights seem to become one and then disappeared after the acending for a short distance

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
Iwas smoking in my front porch talking to a friend as i witness these monstrous balls of light in the air. my friend witnessed my genuine reaction, and quite frankly, am scared they were spying on me and still are. i know what i saw, and it disappeared quickly around 11:30. wasnt paying attention to time, as i was contemplating how i saw a freaking ufo. it was definitely not human. it was over this notorious spot called the bump and grind, and there have been unreported sightings of ufos from there. it was huge. it was bright. it was watching me and as i approached it even though it was miles away, it disappeared quickly. this is the short version of it, as im tired and scared rn. asi pulled my phone out to take a pic, it was gone. my friend who lived by there 6 years ago witnessed an abduction in front of his house.I need someone to talk to about this
 
nobody, even my parents believe it. i am scared.
content.summary: Saw 3 gelatenous orbs 2 white, 1 red, and glowed very brightly. was triangular, disappeared quickly

content.detailedDescription: I got out of my truck and instantly saw a very bright flash of light. i first thought it was a plane but it was brighter than that and no other lights associated with it. it flashed several more times and i never could see any other marker lights. it flashed once in or above a cloud and it made the entire cloud flash too. the flashes were random in length in between flashes. it moved very slowly and it was pretty high up. i've seen planes and they fly a lot faster than this.
content.summary: Bright flashes of light

content.detailedDescription:
I have lived in aumsville for a little over 5 years.  since moving here i have observed several "light" in the sky, times vary, as do the color of lights.  all except one have been stationary.  for the last couple of months i have regularly witnessed a triangle shape of lights, white, green, orange / yellow.  the first time i witnessed this they were almost due north.  a week later, due west, then approx. one week later, due south.  tonight i walked out and for the first time observed the one due south and other due west.  this is the first time i have seen two that appear to be the same shape light.  both were stationary, no sound heard and the bottom light, (orange/yellow) seemed to pulsate.  i noticed tonight there appeared to be planes or helocopters in the area.  some made noise... some did not.

as i finish this... they are still there.  i don't have a clue what they are but i am certain that they are not conventional aircraft, they stay in place , do not move for sometimes hours.

i submit this because i accept that it is a ufo, meaning i can't identify it.  i worked for the government for over 20 years and in law enforcement.  my observation skills, objective attitude is something i take pride in.  that being said, i know a lot of people that would consider me a nut job if i was to contact local authorities to witness what i have been observing.
content.summary: Witnessed same lights, same location on multiple dates.  tonight, a 2nd appeared.  one due south, one due west

content.detailedDescription: I was walking into my parents backyard from the alley when i noticed a fireball that seemed sentient in the sky..It was slightly above tree initially and it was moving left..It looked translucent on the right side like it was gas emitting from it. i felt like it was trying to communicate with me just by the feeling that i felt. i wasn't scared but i dialed my dad who was inside the house to come look at it but it slowly and hurriedly moved upward in the process until it disappeared. it was remarkable how fast but slow it seemed to be moving..Earlier in the day i must say that i was having a lot of deja vu.
content.summary: Fireball slightly above tree moving left then slowly and fastly upward until disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
It was going low below clouds thought it was a balloon floating but too big. dogs balls tennis balls all lined up a foot apart in straight row! that doesn't happen with a puppy! talking to friend on phone about it! she was in las vegas.It wasn't too far going over backyard! then slowly floated sideways then went straight up in clouds fast!

few days later friends told me about the patterson siting over the air-force base! 30 miles west! that's when i realized this thing might be real! the color is like camouflage and the way it floats makes it hard to detect!Keep me posted on any new developments! were they playing with the dog balls? that was in precision the straight line one foot apart from each! dogs couldn't have done that! it also was pointing in a slant the same direction the balloon floated. 
the date was the same day i believe it was saw in patterson! i told my family and some people about the balls and balloon before i ever knew it was on the internet. they can witness to that and on my facebook! they didn't listen until i showed them a few days later on the internet what it looked like light blue! others saw it too!
content.summary: Light blue like sky! thought it was a ballon but too big for one! going south then shot straight up in clouds.
